citations.narrative:
The facility has not reviewed its contingency plan since 2021. Failure to annually review the contingency plan may
compromise preparedness for predicted or unanticipated events. The facility must review its contingency plan annually,
assuring it adequately addresses criteria listed in paragraph (l)(1) of this section and is changed or amended as needed.
The facility must then maintain documentation of these reviews.
Correct by March 30, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.38(l)(2) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
The facility has not reviewed its contingency plan since 2021. Failure to annually review the contingency plan may 
compromise preparedness for predicted or unanticipated events. The facility must review its contingency plan annually, 
assuring it adequately addresses criteria listed in paragraph (l)(1) of this section and is changed or amended as needed. 
The facility must then maintain documentation of these reviews. 
 
Correct by March 30, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
